content.value:
For @themandalorian, they hired an actual Deaf actor to play one of the Tusken raiders and help create Tusken Sign Language. 😍

They did this bc a hearing person who knew ASL suggested it.

It’s our responsibility, when we’re in the room, to look around and see who’s missing.
content.html: For @themandalorian, they hired an actual Deaf actor to play one of the Tusken raiders and help create Tusken Sign Language. 😍 They did this bc a hearing person who knew ASL suggested it. It’s our responsibility, when we’re in the room, to look around and see who’s missing.
